resources.string: When does your late bus normally arrive? (Try to be as accurate about this as possible, and an earlier estimate is better than a later one.)
Where do you normally board the late bus from?
What late bus route are you on? Select the one that applies to you best (e.g. if an express route option applies to you, select that instead of the normal late bus entry).
You don\'t need to do anything more! The next time you should open this app is on the day you have to catch the late bus. You\'ll be able to track it in real time!
Looks like there was an error registering. Would you like to try again or quit?\n\nIf the problem persists, you should contact the app developer at hello@catchit.com.

To protect this app from being used by stalkers, abductors, etc. you must enter this app\'s passcode, which you can find either by emailing the developer or asking friends. Please keep this secret unless someone trustworthy asks you for it!
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Allow this phone to use location services to report the location of the bus. Your location will never be publicly revealed, be analyzed personally by the app developers, or be stored on our servers for more than a few hours. Also, this app won\'t work if no one contributes to tracking the bus, so if your data limits allow so, please keep this setting enabled!! Tests show that the app only uses about 0.1 MB/day if location services is enabled.
